UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Foreign Currency Translation
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from foreign currency translation.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Interest on Income Taxes Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.description: Amount of interest expense accrued for an underpayment of income taxes.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Interest on Income Taxes Expense
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.description: Amount of interest expense for an underpayment of income taxes.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Reduction Resulting from Lapse of Applicable Statute of Limitations
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.label: Write off of Deferred Debt Issuance Cost
WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.description: Write-off of amounts previously capitalized as debt issuance cost in an extinguishment of debt.

GoodwillPeriodIncreaseDecrease.label: Goodwill, Period Increase (Decrease)
GoodwillPeriodIncreaseDecrease.description: Amount of increase (decrease) of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminab.label: Equity Securities without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Downward Price Adjustment, Annual Amount
EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminab.description: Amount of loss from downward price adjustment on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

GainLossOnInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Investments
GainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.label: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Declared
CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.description: Aggregate dividends declared during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

DividendsCash.label: Dividends, Cash
DividendsCash.description: Amount of paid and unpaid cash dividends declared for classes of stock, for example, but not limited to, common and preferred.

PaymentsOfDividends.label: Payments of Dividends
PaymentsOfDividends.description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

TreasuryStockCommonShares.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Shares
TreasuryStockCommonShares.description: Number of previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

TreasuryStockCommonValue.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Value
TreasuryStockCommonValue.description: Amount allocated to previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

DefinedBenefitPlanAccumulatedBenefitObli.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Accumulated Benefit Obligation
DefinedBenefitPlanAccumulatedBenefitObli.description: Amount of actuarial present value of benefits attributed to employee service rendered, excluding assumptions about future compensation level.

DefinedBenefitPlanActualReturnOnPlanAsse.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Increase (Decrease) for Actual Return (Loss)
DefinedBenefitPlanActualReturnOnPlanAsse.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in plan assets of defined benefit plan from actual return (loss) determined by change in fair value of plan assets adjusted for contributions, benefit payments, and other expenses.

DefinedBenefitPlanActuarialGainLoss.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Actuarial Gain (Loss)
DefinedBenefitPlanActuarialGainLoss.description: Amount of gain (loss) from change in actuarial assumptions which (increases) decreases benefit obligation of defined benefit plan. Assumptions include, but are not limited to, interest, mortality, employee turnover, salary, and temporary deviation from substantive plan.

DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitObligation.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation
DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitObligation.description: Amount of actuarial present value of benefits attributed to service rendered by employee for defined benefit plan.

DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitObligationBenef.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Benefits Paid
DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitObligationBenef.description: Amount of payment to participant of defined benefit plan which decreases benefit obligation. For pension plan, payment includes, but is not limited to, pension benefits and death benefits. For other postretirement plan, payment includes, but is not limited to, prescription drug benefits, health care benefits, life insurance benefits, and legal, educational and advisory services.

DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitObligationContr.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Contributions by Plan Participant
DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitObligationContr.description: Amount of contributions received by defined benefit plan from participant which increase benefit obligation.

DefinedBenefitPlanContributionsByEmploye.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Contributions by Employer
DefinedBenefitPlanContributionsByEmploye.description: Amount of contribution received by defined benefit plan from employer which increases plan assets.

DefinedBenefitPlanDivestituresBenefitObl.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Divestiture
DefinedBenefitPlanDivestituresBenefitObl.description: Amount of decrease in benefit obligation of defined benefit plan from disposal or classification as held-for-sale.

DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Amount
DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets.description: Amount of asset segregated and restricted to provide benefit under defined benefit plan. Asset includes, but is not limited to, stock, bond, other investment, earning from investment, and contribution by employer and employee.

DefinedBenefitPlanForeignCurrencyExchang.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Foreign Currency Translation Gain (Loss)
DefinedBenefitPlanForeignCurrencyExchang.description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which (increases) decreases benefit obligation of defined benefit plan.

DefinedBenefitPlanFundedStatusOfPlan.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Funded (Unfunded) Status of Plan
DefinedBenefitPlanFundedStatusOfPlan.description: Amount of funded (unfunded) status of defined benefit plan, measured as difference between fair value of plan assets and benefit obligation. Includes, but is not limited to, overfunded (underfunded) status.

DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsBenefitsPaid.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Benefits Paid
DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsBenefitsPaid.description: Amount of payment to participant under defined benefit plan which decreases plan assets. For pension plan, payment includes, but is not limited to, pension benefits and death benefits. For other postretirement plan, payment includes, but is not limited to, prescription drug benefits, health care benefits, life insurance benefits, and legal, educational and advisory services.

DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsContribution.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Contributions by Plan Participant
DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsContribution.description: Amount of contributions received by defined benefit plan from participant which increases plan assets.

DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsForeignCurre.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Foreign Currency Translation Gain (Loss)
DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsForeignCurre.description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which increases (decreases) plan assets of defined benefit plan.

IncomeTaxReconciliationDispositionOfBusi.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Disposition of Business, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationDispositionOfBusi.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the disposition of a business not qualifying as a discontinued operation.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPl.label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, after Tax and Reclassification Adjustment, Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPl.description: Amount, after tax and reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan, attributable to parent.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification and Tax, Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, after tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness, attributable to parent.
